shell-template.name: Network (${interface}, wpa_supplicant)
shell-template.enable: pexec-options no-pipe; wpa_supplicant -D ${configuration_network_interfaces_${interface}_wpa_supplicant_driver} -i ${interface} -c ${configuration_network_interfaces_${interface}_wpa_supplicant_config} -w -B; wpa_cli -i ${interface} -B; erc ${configuration_network_interfaces_${interface}_ip}-${interface} enable&
